page.title: 06THE SANDAY SHIPPING MASTER
page.content: Mr.Wilson likes the job of being shipping master on Sanday. His job involves{recording the times boats {arrive & depart,}&{checking the goods which come off & are put on. He helps put the{gang plank}in place & tells people when their packages have arrived.{4 passenger boats}come regularly to Sanday. The{"Orcadia"}& the{"Islander"}carry{goods}to Sanday & Sanday folk send back cattle, sheep, food, clothing (by the Sanday knitters), etc. The{"Golden Mariana" mainly carries{passengers}& she can be {chartered}for football trips, etc. The{"Guide"}has just started a {12-passenger service}to Sanday. In the near future the{"Orcadia"}& the {"Islander"}might be replaced by{"Storm {Masters"}which are smaller vessels with a{"Ro-Ro"}capacity. It is unsure whether they will be a success.
